attributes.action: Instruct the press (all media) to stop talking about the credit crunch and housing market which is currently to blame for all the uncertainty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The press/all media are currently talking us all into a depression. We need you Gordon to stand up for the country and put a blackout on all the press.The current situation with the housing market is mostly being created by the press as being in the property industry I know there are buyers out there with money to spend, they just dont want to spend it yet because of the uncertainty being created by the press. Give them something better to write about and call a general election!!!
